title: Chapter 594 - New World:
body:
Chapter 594 - New World:


In this world, most men could not resist the allure of a beautiful lady.


Of course, these ladies would never offer themselves voluntarily, such as sending a friend request to their prey. The smart ones would sense something amiss and flee.


But if they allowed the prey to roam into an otherwise hidden enclosure, the prey would never be aware of his peril until it was too late.


Every step he took was one step closer to his grave…


Playboys plagued this world. They knew the magic words needed to put a smile on a lady’s face. They would pounce on the opportunity to say ‘yes’ to each other demands. Of course, PlayGirls existed too. These ladies may not have been born with pretty faces, but they could instantly transform into goddesses with some makeup and a key ingredient: sultry, seductive hip-swaying.


Some ladies were gifted with a mysterious charm; people could not stop themselves from talking to them. If they had the looks, men would start thinking with their nether regions, rather than their heads. If these pretty faces asked for the love of one night, how many men would say no to them?


Single guys would assume that the lady was dead serious. Men with partners would be divided into two groups. The good ones would refuse the invitation. The other group would fulfill her needs without hesitation, hoping for another chance in the future. It would be great if they could be regular friends with benefits.


Such was the nature of living creatures. Whether it was a man or a woman, they were vulnerable to temptations.


Lady Zhao was rich enough to buy more than a single type of character. This time, she easily hired the perfect slut. This lady was experienced in relationships, and lots of men were willing to die for her. She was an expert at snagging prey through online exchanges.


Unlike the angelic Lady Zhao, she had been born with an ordinary face. However, her makeup skills were otherworldly, a dab here, a trace there, she would look like a true Goddess.


Most of all, she attended an ordinary university in Jiangnan. She was experienced in relationships and smarter than ordinary girls, but she was humble enough to appreciate every man for what they did best.


Of course, Zhao Youyue was not going to contact her directly. If things got out of her, her involvement in this would get revealed. Nevertheless, her “Little Beauty” plan worked marvelously. With unlimited funds, catfishing would be bold, direct and effective.


Like mice with cheese on a mousetrap, men would easily be seduced, unless they were weirdos like Han Leng and Du Hang.


Catfishing was a slow, deliberate process. You will not see the results after a day or two. The prey must never be alerted to the danger.


Cao Chuanguang had thoroughly underestimated the influence of the Zhao family. If they wanted it, they could take much more than his fame and glory – taking his life wasn’t out of the question.


Even so, this was like a side-hobby for Zhao Youyue. She moved back to the “Two Dimensional Gate,” hoping that it would provide her with a much more practical world this time.


She had not spent much time in “Perfect Acting,” so the cooldown duration was short. It was not exactly a sleeping victory, but she had cleverly used Zhang Guorong’s real-life fame to great effect, creating an iconic character with relative ease.


Zhao Youyue was still basking in the afterglow of her last success. That victory had just been ridiculous.


It was just another ordinary night when Zhao Youyue pushed open the “Two Dimensional Gate” again. She was having a bad feeling about this. After forging an iconic card, the “Two Dimensional Gate” would rob her of all her luck, forcing her to play along in a plain, dull world…


Her eyes flew wide open when she saw the title, “Fast Track: No Limits.” It was a famous comic that had yet to end!


The comic already had a moving picture adaptation of its own. Its GIF and memes have had limited success on the internet. Some of its lines were even trending at that moment.


“Yesterday I lost to a Wuling Hong Guang on xx mountain.[1] He drifted around corners like a goddamn janitor. His car had been blazingly fast; all I could see was his xxx advertisement on the car. If you know who he is, please tell him this Saturday, 5pm, I will be waiting for him at xx mountain.”


That’s right, “Fast Track: No Limits” should be a version of the famous racing manga, “Initial D” that we all know in another dimension.[2] Mountain road-racing was ridiculously exciting. You’ll never see such action in reality. Real-life automotive racing often took place on well-built, even terrain with specially-built racing cars. Formula One racing was great, but drifting was utterly unnecessary on track.[3]


In the manga, customized but otherwise consumer-level vehicles would speed down the hill, defying the laws of physics. It was oddly satisfying.


Zhao Youyue’s cousin had started to race after reading “Fast Track: No Limits.” He did not know how to modify a car, nor did he know how to drift on the road. Still, he dreamt of being an underground car racer. It was cool.


Because he wanted to be cool, he had almost immediately totaled his supercar that was worth billions. Age had mellowed him down, albeit just a little. Every once in a while, he would bet heavily on his favorite underground racer. It was for his old hobby’s sake, but he would not dare get in a car himself and race down the dangerous cliffs anymore.


Zhao Youyue read the summary of this latest story. Enough of it was spoken about on the internet. It had been adapted into other mediums. Once again, she had struck the jackpot!


She was the queen of luck!


Zhao Youyue totally forgot about Cao Chuanguang’s disgusting efforts. Her mind was already racing on methods that allowed her to forge an iconic female racer from “Initial D”…


Once she learns how to race and drift like a maniac, she could participate in real-life underground racing!


Translation Note:


[1] Wuling Hong Guang is a compact Multi-Purpose Vehicle (MPV) produced since September 2010 by SAIC-GM-Wuling, the joint venture of Shanghai Automotive Industry Corporation, Liuzhou Wuling Motors Co and GM China. Between 2013 and 2017 it was marketed as Chevrolet Enjoy in India by GM India and in Indonesia by SAIC-GM-Wuling Motor Indonesia since 2017 as Wuling Confero S, where it was launched to the public on 2 August 2017.


[2]Initial D (Japanese: Dイニシャル・ディー Hepburn: Inisharu Dī) is a Japanese sports manga series written and illustrated by Shuichi Shigeno. It was serialized in Young Magazine from 1995 to 2013, with the chapters collected into 48 tankōbon volumes by Kodansha. The story focuses on the world of illegal Japanese street racing, where all the action is concentrated in the mountain passes and rarely in cities or urban areas, and with the drift racing style emphasized in particular. Professional race car driver and pioneer of drifting Keiichi Tsuchiya helped with editorial supervision. The story is centred on the prefecture of Gunma, more specifically on several mountains in the Kantō region and in their surrounding cities and towns. Although some of the names of the locations the characters race in have been fictionalized, all of the locations in the series are based on actual locations in Japan.


[3] Formula One (also Formula 1 or F1) is the highest class of single-seater auto racing sanctioned by the Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile (FIA) and owned by the Formula One Group. The FIA Formula One World Championship has been one of the premier forms of racing around the world since its inaugural season in 1950. The “formula” in the name refers to the set of rules to which all participants’ cars must conform. A Formula One season consists of a series of races, known as Grands Prix (French for “grand prizes” or “great prizes”), which are held worldwide on purpose-built circuits and public roads.
